title: wine_Archery_Summit_2008_Premier_Cuvée_Pinot_Noir_(Willamette_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 100037.
country: US.
description: A fine, elegant Pinot Noir, still in its infancy, with bright cranberry and raspberry fruit taking center stage. A shimmering, vivid, youthful vitality elevates the fruit flavors, with juicy acidity and restrained oak influence. Though this is the least expensive wine in the Archery Summit portfolio, it may surprise those who cellar it. Some extra years in the bottle could bring out unsuspected depth and power..
designation: Premier Cuvée.
points: 90.
price: 48.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Willamette Valley.
region_2: Willamette Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
taster_twitter_handle: @paulgwine .
